name: DeleteSipCredentialListMapping
description: Delete a CredentialListMapping resource from an account.

AccountSid.description: The unique id of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) responsible for this resource.

DomainSid.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies the SIP Domain that includes the resource to delete.

Sid.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies the resource to delete.
